channel.title: Items stay dropped forever
channel.description:
Hello guys, I am making a new event on my server and I want an item to be dropped forever in the server. Even if you logout and log back in, it is still dropped. Can someone please tell me how to do that? Thanks!
+1 rep if helped :)
